# default

**Type Property**

A behavior that matches the activity to a scene using the identifier of your activity object.

## Declaration

```swift
static let `default`: SceneAssociationBehavior
```

## Discussion

With this option, the system uses the string in the [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupActivity/activityIdentifier] property of your [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupActivity] object to locate an appropriate scene. Choose this option if your app has only one scene, or if you always use the same scene to display the intended activity.

## Getting the scene-association options

- **content(_:)**: A behavior that matches the activity to a scene using a custom string that you supply.
- **none**: A behavior that doesn’t match any scenes to the activity.
